text: Dane’s eyes shoot up... to the SHADOWY FACE PEERING OUT F BEHIND SOME HANGING SHIRTS.  31. DANE (cont’d) Shit! He slams the door... scrambles back, grabbing a BASEBALL from the floor, and flipping on the light. He stares at t closet, heart racing. Suddenly Lucas steps in from the hall.
What’re you doin’? Dane jumps with a start... almost goes all Barry Bonds on Lucas.
There’s somebody in my closet. Now Lucas is scared. But Dane feels braver with Lucas there... leans to the door... to the handle.

Maybe you shouldn’t do that. But Dane is doing that. He grabs the handle... pulls the closet door open... .--and with the light on, we can all see there’s nothing a DEREK JETER CARDBOARD STANDEE peering from behind the clothes. Lucas snorts with laughter... loves finally seei Dane scared. LUCAS (cont'd) (snorts with laughter) Nice call. If you’re too scared, I‘1ll ask him for an autograph for you. Lucas LAUGHS his way out of the room... leaving Dane alon confused. He reaches over... flips off the bedroom light. looks back at the cardboard face... maybe it was just dar Dane closes the door... slides a chair over under the han to keep it closed, then backs his way into bed. He lies there... staring at that closet door. INT. PAYTON HOUSE/LUCAS’ ROOM - DAY Lucas is dressed in a collared shirt, tucked into jeans, Susan hovers over him, quickly brushing his hair. Lucas i not happy.  32.
Why do I have to do it today?

Because today’s registration at your school, and because I changed my shift at the hospital to do it. Now hold still, we're late. Susan secures Lucas’ chin to get a better grip. Dane step into the room, in shorts and t-shirt, flipping his phone closed.
Why doesn’t Dane have to go?
Because I’m in a school where they don’t make you take naps and drink out of sippy cups.
Neither do we, dickhead.

Hey! (to Dane) I know he didn’t learn that one from Spongebob. (back to Lucas) And Dane’s not going because his registration is next week. (to Dane) What are you doing this morning, besides trying to cause trouble?
Julie’s gonna show me around this ghost town. We're gonna try to see everything there is in less than ten minutes.
Just be back here by four. I have to work tonight. Susan walks past Dane, kissing him on the head as she pas Lucas follows her, and Dane grabs his arm... waits for Su to move out of range, then...
(whispers) Don’t say anything to Mom about last night.  33. Lucas pulls away from Dane.
Who’s the baby now? Dane makes a move for Lucas, but he hurries after Susan.
Susan opens the door to leave, and there’s Julie, just ab to ring the bell.
Oh, hey, Julie.
Hi, Mrs. Payton.
We're on our way out, but Dane’s upstairs. (yelling back) Dane, Julie’s here. (to Julie) You guys have fun. Dane comes walking down the stairs behind them, slipping his shoes.
Susan shoves Lucas into the car, waves back to Dane and J at the front door.
Four o'clock. Don’t be late. Dane waves... got it. They watch Susan pull away... and Lucas hang out the window.
Watch out for Derek Jeter! Lucas ducks back in, laughing.
What’s that mean?
Nothing. He’s an idiot. You ready?  34.
Bensonville, here we come. They walk toward the street. EXT. BENSONVILLE/MAIN-STREET -— DAY Mayberry with a facelift. Dane and Julie walk down the sidewalk.
So did you guys get all moved in?
Unfortunately.
What, you’d rather be back in New Jersey or wherever?
It was Brooklyn actually. Philadelphia, Boston and Queens before that. Maybe Jersey was in there somewhere.
So do you even bother to unpack the boxes?
Every time. My Mom’s always sure the next move is the last one.
She seems nice.
She’s cool, I guess. She’s a nurse over at the hospital.
What about your Dad?

Not so cool. (beat) He’s been locked up since Lucas was a baby... is supposed to get out soon. I was just a little kid back then, so I’m not worried about him anymore. But my mom’s not real anxious for a reunion. (MORE )
DANE (cont'd) She won’t admit it, but I think that’s why we keep doing the moving thing.
Bensonville’s a great place to hide out. He can’t look someplace nobody even knows exists. And it really isn’t that bad here. I mean school sucks, but it probably sucked in Brooklyn too, right?
Pretty much. Dane notices a COUPLE GIRLS staring at them from across t street.
You guys are like celebrities around here. Most people move out of Bensonville, not into it.
Great.

Plus you moved into Freaky Franklin’s house. (off Dane’s look) The guy that lived there before you... Ethan Franklin. He was like crazy or something. They ended up dragging him off to the psycho hospital or something.
(rolls his eyes) Home sweet home.
Lucas charges through the front door.
Dane! (off the silence)
Susan walks in behind him.  36.
He’s probably still out with Julie. He’1l be home soon. Lucas hurries up the stairs.
Lucas runs to Dane’s doorway... looks in... empty. His bo slumps.
Lucas is on the floor playing xbox. Susan is behind him o the phone.
No, I said to be home by four, not start home then. Just hurry.

Susan hangs up... bends down to kiss Lucas on the head. SUSAN (cont'd) I’ve got to get to work, but Dane’s on his way. Call me if he isn’t here in fifteen minutes. Lucas nods without looking away from the screen. SUSAN (cont'd) I love you, Sweetie.
(in his video game drone) Love you too. Susan hustles for the door.

And don’t stay up too late. I’11 come check on you when I get home. Lucas just nods as he continues playing, doesn’t even not Susan walk out, as his fingers dance over the buttons, un his futuristic soldier dies a bloody alien death onscreen Lucas tosses the controller away... turns the game off. H glances around, already bored. He pulls himself up... sta for the stairs.  37. INT. PAYTON HOUSE/LUCAS’ ROOM - DAY Lucas enters... grabs his pad and pencil, then notices th CLOWN MARIONETTE PROPPED UP ON HIS PILLOW. It’s almost hu looking... round face poking out from under the long, red gold, belled hat. It’s painted eyes stare at Lucas. Lucas returns the stare, nervous at first, then realizing it got there... Dane. He throws an angry glare back out i the hall, and grabs the clown by the arm... jerks it off bed, drags it out the door. The clown’s bells jingle agai the floor. INT. PAYTON HOUSE/DANE’S ROOM - DAY Lucas shoves the marionette under Dane’s sheets... pulls back to get the full effect of the reveal, then snickers his little trick. He tosses the covers back over the clow starts out, then stops... sees the VIDEO CAMERA on the fl

Dark... quiet... until the FLICK OF THE LIGHT SWITCH cast dim glow over the room. Lucas moves down the steps, carrying the camera. He walks past the rusty freezer chest... the shelves of tools... t the trap door. He pulls the trap door open, folding it ba onto the floor... .--and there’s that hole, so black it almost glows. Lucas crouches down beside it.

(into hole) Hello! He waits for his echo, but the hole swallowed it, just li it does everything else. Lucas grabs the flashlight from floor... aims the beam into the center of the black... st doesn’t help. AND THEN A JINGLE... but it’s not coming from the hole, i coming from the back corner of the basement. Lucas’ head shoots up... he squints into the shadows... raises the flashlight... .-».the circle of light rises up the floor... to THE CLOW MARIONETTE sitting in the corner of the basement, staring back at Lucas.  38. Lucas freezes... except for his heart, which is about to right out of his chest. He stares back at the clown, want to run, but also afraid to look away... .»+.SoO Lucas and the clown just hold their gaze on each other... like a bizarre stare contest... eyes locked... neither flinching... -..until THE CLOWN BLINKS. Lucas flies backward... drops the flashlight... it hits t cement floor and rolls into the hole... disappears. Then here comes that clown... CRAWLING OUT OF THE SHADOWS ALL FOURS, like some invisible puppeteer is controlling i limbs. The basement is filled with the TINKLING BELLS. Lucas CRIES OUT... scrambles to his feet... throws anothe glance to the marionette... crawling fast... too fast. Lucas takes off... charges for the steps... races up... stumbles... SLAM... falls... doesn’t want to look back, b we can all hear those BELLS GROWING LOUDER, so Lucas does look... just in time to see the clown starting up the ste after him like some kind of horrible insect. Lucas SCREAMS... crawls up the rest of the stairs... figh with the door handle enough to make us think he might not out, as the marionette scurries up behind him. But then Lucas does get it open... he dives out.

Lucas slams the door closed, just as the clown reaches th top step. He takes a step back... eyes the silent door... then watches the DOORKNOB BEGIN TO TURN. Lucas throws his weight against the door, pressing it shu Suddenly a HAND DROPS ONTO LUCAS’ SHOULDER. Lucas SCREAMS spins... right into Dane. Lucas dives against Dane, huggi him... sliding back around behind him.
What’s wrong with you?
It came after me.
What?  39.
That clown doll... the one you tried to scare me with. It’s trying to get up here. Dane’s too confused to even ask, so he reaches for the do LUCAS (cont'd)
Too late... Dane has it swung open... AND THERE’S NO CLOW Lucas peeks out around Dane’s body... squints down the st LUCAS (cont'd) It was right there. It chased me.
A doll chased you.
(nods furiously) The one you put in my bed.
I don’t know what you’re talkin’ about, but I didn’t put any clowns in your bed. I might have if I thought about it, but I didn’t.
It was there.
On the steps.
In my bed, then I put it in your bed to scare you, then it was downstairs.
Okay, you know what, there’s all kinds of weird crap goin’ on in there... (taps Lucas’ head) ...that I don’t even wanna know about, so whatever. The clown’s gone, so we're cool.
It’s still down there somewhere!  40. Lucas’ head’s about to explode, so Dane just GROANS... st down the steps.

Lucas hangs onto the back of Dane’s shirt, as they descen into the basement. They move across the room, with Lucas holding on... spinning around for any sneak attacks from rear. Then Dane sees the open trap door.
You weren’t supposed to keep messing with that.
And you were supposed to be home before Mom left. Dane glances around... squints into the shadows.
Well there’s no clown, so can we go back up? Lucas points into the dark corner.
It was over there. Lucas shoves Dane toward the corner... follows right behi not letting loose of that handful of shirt. They reach th wall... still nothing.

Maybe it’s one of those man-eating, invisible clown dolls. And then a THUMP... SCRAPE from behind them. They turn... see a LITTLE GIRL, (7), SITTING AT THE BOTTOM OF THE STEP Her back is to them, as she bounces a small ball... THUMP scoops up several jacks... SCRAPE. He long blonde hair ha down over her PINK PARTY DRESS. DANE (cont’d) Who the hell’s that? Lucas just shakes his head. DANE (cont’d) (to the little girl) Hey!  41. No answer... just THUMP... SCRAPE. Dane suddenly looks a little nervous. DANE (cont’d) Is she one of your little friends?
No. Dane watches her drop the ball again... THUMP... SCRAPE.. then starts toward her.

Little girl. The girl doesn’t glance back... doesn’t even alter her rhythm... just keeps playing those jacks... THUMP... SCRAPE... THUMP... SCRAPE. Dane and Lucas move closer to her back... closer... close until they’re standing right over the little girl, as she stares down, playing. DANE (cont’d) Are you lost or something? And then the little girl picks up the last of the jacks.. SCRAPE... then slowly looks up at the boys... and her fac so pale it’s almost blue... her eyes are solid black, and it’s like she is CRYING TEARS OF BLOOD.
I don’t want to die. Dane scrambles backward, dragging Lucas with him. They bo back against the wall... watch the little girl stand... w slowly up the steps.

Dane? Dane’s too scared to answer... just watches her disappear through the doorway. Then he moves to the bottom of the steps... stretches to see if she’s still there... she isn So the brothers start up. LUCAS (cont'd) Why don’t we just stay down here? Dane keeps moving up... so Lucas does too.
Dane and Lucas lean in the doorway... glance around... no sign of the little girl.
Hey! Nothing. So Dane builds up the nerve to step through. The glance around... see the FRONT DOOR CRACKED OPEN.
Did you close that when you came home?
I don’t remember. The brothers move as one toward the door.
Dane and Lucas step outside... glance up and down the str She isn’t out here either. But Julie is, reading a magazi on her front porch.
You didn’t see a little girl out here did you?
With blood dripping out of her eyes? Dane elbows Lucas... shut up.
What?
She had this makeup or something on her face.
Do you know her? Dane shakes his head. Julie tosses the magazine, and skip off the porch. JULIE (cont'd) And she was in your house?  43.
Playing jacks down in the basement.
Jacks? (off their nod) Maybe she knows that other guy... thought he still lived here.
Yeah. Maybe. Julie reaches them.
Did you ask her?
(nods ) She said she didn’t want to die.
(to Lucas) You don’t have to answer every question.
That she didn’t want to die?
That’s what it sounded like. It was hard to hear. And then Julie sees something beyond the boys.
Is that her? Dane and Lucas spin... in time to see the back of the lit girl as she walks down the basement steps. Dane takes off after her, with Lucas and Julie right behi
Hey, little girl!
The kids stampede down the steps... reach the bottom... j in time to see... ...the LITTLE GIRL CRAWLING ON HER STOMACH INTO THE HOLE. HER LEGS DISAPPEARING just before the TRAP DOOR SLAMS SHU

Dane, Lucas and Julie can’t move... can barely remember t breathe... just stare at that trap door. Finally, they ease toward it... reach the trap door, exch a “should we” glance before Dane grabs the handle... pull back open... ...and there’s that DEEP, DARK, EMPTY HOLE.
Close it, Dane. Dane just keeps gazing down into the black.
Hello? No answer.
Dane... please.
She’s gotta be down there.
Dane.
Close it! Lucas tears the trap door loose from Dane’s grip... slams shut.
We all saw that, right?
If you’re talking about the freaky little girl that just crawled into a bottomless pit under your house... yeah. Dane considers the sound of that... stares down at the tr door, then looks to Lucas.
What’d you do with the locks?
I left them right there.
Well they’re not here now.  45. They do a quick search... no luck.
Maybe she took them.
Why would she have taken locks?
So we couldn’t keep her down there anymore. They exchange another creeped-out glance.
Or maybe it wasn’t her that took them. Maybe it was the man last night... or the clown.
Hang on. What man... what clown?
Nothin’. (beat) What kinda hole is this?

And Dane, Lucas and Julie sitting at the bottom of the st their backs against the wall, staring at that hole. Lucas between Dane and Julie, wearing a CATCHER’S MASK and hold Dane’s baseball bat. Dane has a paintball helmet on, with the paintball gun across his lap, and Julie holds a KITCH KNIFE in one hand and pointed MEAT THERMOMETER in the oth
It’s the gateway to hell. Like a secret passage for dead people.
Why would that little girl be... (thinking of a way to say hell) ...down there?
Did you check out those eyes? Black... dripping blood. And she did look completely dead.  46.
It’s a gateway to hell.
Dolls don’t go to... Lucas mouths the word to Dane without actually saying it.
Maybe the guy that owned the doll was like some puppet master serial killer... he goes, the clown goes too. Package deal.
Could be a wormhole.
A what?
Like a door between different universes.

It’s not a wormhole. And you need to stop reading so much. You're turnin’ into a little geek. The O.S. DOORBELL RINGS upstairs. They all give a little jump. Then... DANE (cont’d) Pizza guy. Dane shoves some bills into Lucas’ palm. Lucas throws the back.

I’m not going up there. Dane looks to Julie... she shakes her head. Dane rolls hi eyes... throws a glance up the stairs, then takes off, gu ready to fire. Lucas and Julie keep their eyes locked on that hole... until Lucas glances to the meat thermometer. LUCAS (cont'd) I wonder what temperature that little girl is. She looked cold.  47.
The PIZZA GUY stands at the front door. The door swings o and there’s Dane, in full paintball gear. The Pizza Guy j looks him. Dane makes a quick exchange... cash for pizza.
Thanks, dude. And just like that, the door swings shut in the Pizza Guy face. He stands there a beat before walking back to his c
Dane hurries back down the steps with the pizza.
Anything? Lucas and Julie shake their heads... grab a slice each.
When’s Mom get home?
Not till midnight.
We should’ve called her.
It would just freak her out. And if she finds out about this, she'd have us packed up tonight.
Okay with me. And that’s what you want too. Dane doesn’t answer... his eyes dart a quick glance to Julie... he’s not so sure anymore.
Let’s figure out what we’ve got before we tell her anything.
I know what you've got. You’ve got a gateway to hell under your house. (takes another bite) And that’s really cool.  48.

The houses are all dark. The street is quiet. A breeze whispers through the trees. EXT. JULIE’S HOUSE/POOL - NIGHT The wind blows an inflatable ball off the pool... it does lonely bounce over the yard... wedges against the fence leading to the Payton house.

ANGLE ON THE THREE KIDS... still armed to the teeth, but SOUND ASLEEP at the bottom of the steps. Dane’s slumped o with Lucas leaning against him, and Julie’s head on Lucas shoulder. A FIGURE’S SHADOW FLOATS OVER THEM... just hovers there, until Lucas’ eyes blink open... he looks up... SCREAMS... .--and the others fly up, wide awake, weapons ready. And a survival reflex, Dane SQUEEZES THE TRIGGER... POP... ..-before any of them realize it’s SUSAN standing over them... staring down, totally baffled. The ORANGE PAINTBA STAIN drips down from the ceiling beside her head.

I wouldn’t understand anyway, right? Dane and Lucas shake their heads. Susan throws a glance u at the orange dot, then starts up the steps... never noti the open hole across the room. SUSAN (cont'd) Come up when you’re finished. They wait for her to walk out the door, then...
Whatta we do now?
(off the hole) Lock it up for the night.
You lost the locks, remember?  49. Dane walks to the hole... pulls the trap door closed, the glances around the basement until his eyes settle on the RUSTY OLD CHEST FREEZER.

And the kids pushing the massive box on top of the trap d And this thing must weigh a ton because they’re using eve ounce of strength they have to inch it across the floor u it’s resting squarely on top of the trap door. Julie hands Dane the knife and meat thermometer.

Don’t explore anymore without me. Julie starts out the door... throws a glance back to Dane JULIE (cont'd) This was fun. Then she’s gone, and Dane’s left with Lucas staring at hi lips puckered, making KISSING NOISES. Dane just shoves Lu away. The boys walk up the steps, Lucas making sure he’s in fro They reach the top of the stairs... CLICK... the basement goes dark, except for the moonlight through the window, making the old metal freezer almost glow.

Bright and sunny. Joggers and dog-walkers make their way along the street and sidewalk. Susan walks out of the house... climbs into her car, back out of the drive. She pulls away, WAVING TO JULIE ON HER PORCH, as she leav Julie watches for Susan to disappear around the corner, t leaps off her porch... sprints across the yard.
Julie charges through the door... and there are Dane and Lucas standing at the closed basement door, waiting for h  50.
I didn’t think she was ever leaving for work. They throw open the door... charge down.

Dane, Lucas and Julie stampede down the steps... reach th bottom and freeze... ...because the CHEST FREEZER IS STANDING ON ITS END AGAIN THE WALL, like it was just tossed there... AND THE TRAP D SITS UNCOVERED. They all just stare at it, until...
Maybe Mom did it.
Like she could just roll that thing around.
Maybe it was Satan tired of you blocking his gateway to hell.
(nods ) I bet Satan’s strong.
(shakes his head) So he moves an old freezer, but can’t figure out how to get a few locks off? I’d expect more skills outta a guy with Lucifer’s rep.

Well somebody moved it. Dane walks over to the freezer... gives it a shove... the metal box just rocks a few inches, but enough that... ...a CRUSHED BEER CAN tumbles off to the floor beside Dan feet. Dane stares at the can a second, then reaches down. picks up the can... sniffs the top. JULIE (cont'd) You guys have a party down here last night?  51. Dane shakes his head.
I bet Satan drinks a lot too.
You said the dude that used to live here... that they took him to some psycho place. (off Julie’s nod) Is he locked up?
I don’t know.
Where do they keep him?
The old hospital west of town.
Let’s go see if we can ask him some questions.
(points to the trap door) What about that? They all stare at the trap door a beat, then...
ANGLE OF THE TRAP DOOR... as Dane HAMMERS NAILS ALL AROUN THE EDGES, sealing it shut. He gives the handle a tug... doesn’t move.
Let’s see how Satan does with nails.
Old is right... and in need of a paint job. A high barbed wire fence surrounds the grounds.  52.
Dane, Lucas and Julie walk down the hall to the NURSE’S D An OLD NURSE greets them with a big smile.
Hey kids, what can I do for you?
We'd like to talk to... And then Dane realizes he doesn’t know who it is they wan talk to... he throws a panicked glance to Julie.
Ethan Franklin. The nurse’s smile fades.
Ethan?
If it’s okay. He was my neighbor... we were friends.
I didn’t know that he... I mean, I believe you might be the first visitors Ethan’s had here.
Is he allowed to see people?
Of course. Ethan’s a voluntary. He can see who he pleases... come and go as he likes. (beat) He just likes to stay here.
Why?
I think he just feels safer. (to Julie) And what was your name, dear?
Julie Campbell. The nurse points to the VISITORS AREA... tables, chairs, television. A few people mingle in the room.  53.
I‘ll bring Ethan over to you. The nurse walks down the hall. Dane, Lucas and Julie walk a table... squeeze into the chairs on one side.
What do we say when he gets here?
We ask him about the hole.
Just like that?
Let’s ask him if it’s a worm hole to another universe.

You know what, just don’t talk. We don’t want the freak to think he’s trapped inside some kindergarten Star Wars convention. They see the nurse step out of a room, leading ETHAN FRANKLIN, (50's), t-shirt and sweat pants hanging on his thin frame... long, gray-streaked hair falling over his g face. His fingers twitch in non-stop motion against the sides of his legs. DANE (cont’d) This guy’s not gonna try to eat our livers or anything is he? Lucas’ eyes widen... eat what?
How should I know? All I ever did was stare at him from across the fence.
Hope he doesn’t remember that part. Ethan hasn’t looked up... head tilted to one side, eyes locked on his own BARE FEET. And now Dane is staring at t too, as the nurse guides Ethan to the table.

Here’s your friend Julie, Ethan. Do you remember her? Ethan doesn’t answer... just keeps staring at those feet.  54. NURSE (cont’d) (to Julie) He hasn’t talked much since he’s been here. The Nurse eases Ethan into the chair across from them. NURSE (cont’d) But good luck. And just let me know if you need anything.

Thank you. The nurse walks away. The kids all just stare at Ethan... his knee trembling wildly. Dane gives Julie an elbow. JULIE (cont'd) Hi, Mr. Franklin. I’m Julie Campbell... I used to live beside you. Ethan doesn’t react... just keeps twitching and trembling
(whispers to Julie) Did he always look like this? Julie shakes her head.
We're sorry to bother you, but we wanted to ask you about your old house.
My brother and I live in it now. (beat) We found that trapdoor... in the basement. Suddenly Ethan’s body goes completely still. The kids exchange glances... they just made a connection.
We're trying to find out where it leads. Ethan doesn’t answer. JULIE (cont'd) Mr. Franklin?  55.
We just want to...
The darkness. Now the kids are as still as Ethan. Then...
What does that mean? Is it hell? Is that where the hole leads? Suddenly Ethan’s head flies up... hand shoots out, grabbi Dane by the arm. Ethan’s eyes burn into Dane's.

You didn’t take the locks off? And now it’s Dane’s turn to be unable to speak. ETHAN (cont'd) (deathly serious) Tell me you didn’t take the locks off. The kids don’t tell Ethan that... so he knows the truth. Suddenly he swings his hand down... knocking some invisib object off his leg. ETHAN (cont'd) Why would you do that?
We didn’t know. Ethan stands... starts backing away from them... back to safety of his own room. His eyes dart around, searching f something the rest of us can’t see. DANE (cont’d) What is it?
The darkness knows you.
Knows us? I don’t understand. Did you make it... did you make the hole? Ethan just stares at them... shakes his head.  56.
It’s been there since the world’s first scream. And then Ethan turns... the kids just watch him twitch hi way back down the hall. His door slams shut.
He doesn’t like that hole.
And it doesn’t sound like he made it either.
So we need to find out who did. INT. PAYTON HOUSE/DANE’S ROOM - DAY Julie’s on the phone. Lucas is on Dane’s bed, playing tha handheld game, and Dane’s sitting at the desk, staring at Derek Jeter.

(into phone) No way, really? Are you sure? Then Dane notices something... TWO GREASE-COVERED WORK BO sitting outside the closet. He stares at them a beat, the walks over... picks one up... looks it over, then...
(to Lucas) Did you put these here. Lucas glances up from the game... shakes his head. Dane looks back to the boot... the FOOTPRINT STAIN on the floo He carries the boots out... lays them in the hall.
Okay, thanks, Dad. Julie flips her phone closed. JULIE (cont'd) He said there was a woman that lived there before Ethan Franklin.
Let’s go talk to her.
Can't.  57. Julie leans over, cupping both of Lucas’ ears. JULIE (cont'd) (whispers) She went crazy... killed herself in your kitchen. Julie releases Lucas’ ears, just as...
Killed herself? Now Lucas heard... MOANS.
(off Lucas, to Dane) Nice.
When was this?

Like before I was born. And then a couple different families moved in, but my Dad said they only stayed for a couple weeks... he never really met them. I think he said they both ran off in the middle of the night... left all their stuff in here. Never came back for it.
So none of them made that hole.
The world’s first scream. (off their looks) He said it had been down there since then. When was that? Dane and Julie exchange a glance.
A long time ago.
Dane, Lucas and Susan sit around the table, eating dinner The only sound is the boys’ chewing.

You guys are quiet tonight.  58. Dane shrugs. Lucas sees it works for Dane, so he shrugs t SUSAN (cont'd) Well I guess that means I have to talk. (beat) How would you two feel about having the house to yourselves for a couple days?
Bad. Dane shoots Lucas a hard glance.
Well I got a call today... there’s a meeting I’m supposed to go to... out of town.
What kinda meeting?
The mother kind.
Why can’t we come?
Because it’s one of those grown-up things, and it’1ll be boring, and you'll have more fun here. And I need somebody to keep an eye on the house.
I don’t wanna keep an eye on it. There’s a ho... ANGLE ON DANE’S FOOT UNDER THE TABLE... ..-KICKING LUCAS’ LEG. LUCAS (cont'd)
What’s wrong?
Nothing. We'll be fine if you need to go.  59.
You'll take care of each other for me?
Yeah. Lucas doesn’t answer... just scowls at Dane.
And you'll miss me, right? Lucas nods... alot. SUSAN (cont'd) Okay then. That’s that. They continue eating.
Dark. Everyone’s asleep... or should be. INT. PAYTON HOUSE/DANE’S ROOM - NIGHT Dane awake in bed. Lucas on the floor beside him.
I don’t want her to leave us here.
There’s nothing to be scared of.

You're not scared? Dane notices something on the floor... the SQUARE WINDOW LIGHT where the moon shines through the window. But the image on the floor has LINES STRETCHED OVER THE SQUARE... like bars. Dane looks from the floor to the window... no lines. He stands... moves to the window. LUCAS (cont'd) What are you doin’? Dane doesn’t answer... just waves his hand past the windo and watching his shadow on the floor... of the hand passi over the bars.  60. Dane squints out the window... can’t find what’s causing lines. Finally, he just pulls the curtains closed... the square of light disappears. He climbs back in bed. LUCAS (cont'd) So you’re not scared?
No. We nailed it shut. No way anything's coming out of there.
.--and the NAILS TWISTING UP OUT OF THE WOOD... falling t the floor.
A DOG stands at the WATER DRAIN in the curb of the street clawing at the grate... GROWLING at something deep inside

Lights flicker from a few windows. INT. BENSONVILLE MENTAL HOSPITAL/ETHAN’S ROOM - NIGHT Dark. Ethan sits on the edge of his bed, staring at the sliver of light seeping in under the door. And then a thin shape appears from beneath the door... a SNAKE slithering across the floor. And then ANOTHER SNAKE... from the air vent on the wall.. ...a THICK GREEN SNAKE curls in from the bathroom... -..another crawls out of the sink faucet. Ethan watches them slide toward him.

I knew you’d come. Then Ethan looks above him... to the CEILING TILES BOWING UNDER SOME HEAVY WEIGHT... .--he closes his eyes...  61. .+.-jJust as the tiles break away, and a MASS OF SNAKES P DOWN OVER HIM LIKE RAIN.
Dane and Susan stand outside her SUV. Lucas sits in the passenger seat, defiant. Susan kisses Dane’s cheek.
Be nice to your brother.
If I have to. Susan fakes a laugh... opens the car door.
Susan climbs inside.
So what do you think you’re doing?
Going with you.

I wish you could. But not this time. Susan pulls Lucas into her arms... squeezes him... kisses him. SUSAN (cont'd) There’s nothing to worry about, okay? Lucas’ eyes roll up to Dane... shaking his head outside. Susan leans Lucas back... looks into his face. SUSAN (cont'd) Okay? Lucas finally nods. SUSAN (cont'd) I love you.
I love you too.  62.

When I get back we’1l do something special. Promise. Lucas climbs out... walks around beside Dane. Susan backs out of the drive... HONKS her horn, and waves out her win as she pulls away. SUSAN (cont'd) I’ll be home soon. I love you guys.
Dane and Lucas return the wave... watch Susan disappear d the street. They turn... stare at the house a beat before walking inside.
Lucas sits on the floor, playing Xbox. Dane’s on the couc his eyes locked on the basement door. Lucas sees him.
If you go down there, I’m calling Mom. I’11 tell her everything. Dane pulls his eyes from the door... sees Julie walking toward the back door... entering.
Hey, Lucas.
Hey. Julie walks to Dane... leans close.
(whispers) We need to talk. INT. PAYTON HOUSE/DANE’S ROOM - DAY Dane paces the room, as Julie sits at the desk, typing aw on his computer.
How do you know?  63.
My Dad was talking to somebody from the hospital. They said the doctors think it was a heart attack.
Then it didn’t have anything to do with the hole. I mean it’s nailed shut... so it was just a coincidence. Julie shrugs... isn’t so sure. Neither is Dane.
.-+-and the video game monsters attacking... ...-until Dane’s hand reaches into the frame... turns the television off.
I was almost through the level!
You can finish it when we get back.

Get back from where? Dane heads out the front door without answering. LUCAS (cont'd) Back from where, Dane? Lucas watches Dane and Julie disappear outside, then thro glance to the basement door... and jumps up... races afte them. EXT. BENSONVILLE/MAIN-STREET -— DAY Julie’s car cruises through town.  INT. JULIE’S CAR - DAY 64. Lucas is in the back seat, gazing out the window. He turns... looks past Julie and Dane... through the windshield... ...to the Bensonville Mental Hospital just ahead.
No way!
It’s just for a couple minutes.
What if that Ethan guy sees us again?
Trust me, that’s not gonna be a problem.
Dane, Lucas and Julie reach the nurse’s desk... and the s Old Nurse sits behind it.
We're sorry to bother you, but we came by to see Ethan Franklin the other day.
I remember.
We heard about what happened. Can you tell us anything else. Did he ever talk about anything with you?
It’s not really my place to discuss Ethan. And I’m fairly busy right now, so if you’ll excuse me. The Old Nurse turns to walk away, then...

We live in his old house. And we're scared. Dane nudges Lucas... be quiet. The Nurse stops... looks b at Lucas.  65. INT. BENSONVILLE MENTAL HOSPITAL/ETHAN’S ROOM - DAY The kids watch the Old Nurse rest a box on the desk.

Ethan didn’t have any family, so I’m sure he wouldn’t mind. This is everything he had. Dane and Julie start digging through the box. NURSE (cont’d) I wasn’t here when they found him, but they said he was just sitting there... on the edge of his bed... stiff as a board. Julie pulls out a PAIR OF OVERSIZED RUBBER GLOVES. NURSE (cont’d) Those were Ethan’s snake gloves.
I’m sorry?
He was deathly afraid of snakes. The rare days we could get him outside, he’d put those on with some rubber boots up to his knees.
Did he ever say anything about the darkness?

Sometimes... if he’d get upset. For the first few months he was here, I kept the light on for him at night... I thought he was just afraid of the dark. But then he started turning it off himself. (beat) I don’t think he really wanted to see what was around him. Dane pulls out a SMALL NOTEPAD... flips through the pages some completely colored black... others filled with just CRUDE DESIGNS. But every page is used. NURSE (0.S.) (cont'd) What’s that you’ve got there?  66. Dane spins... sees that the Nurse is talking to Lucas, wh crouched beside the bed. Dane shoves the pad into his pocket. Lucas lifts something up from under the bed... let’s it dangle in the air... .+-.a SNAKE SKIN. NURSE (cont’d) Isn’t that strange.
Dane, Lucas and Julie hurry down the steps toward Julie’s car.
Why would somebody scared to death of snakes keep a snake skin under his bed? Julie shakes her head... no idea. Then Dane stops walking Lucas and Julie look back at him.
What?
Scared to death. (beat) She said they found him just sitting there.
Stiff as a board. I get all stiff when I’m scared. Lucas stiffens up to prove it.
So do I, Lucas.
Lucas sits on a tree swing, just staring... thinking. Dan and Julie sit on the back porch.
So what now?  67. Dane shrugs... pulls out Ethan’s notepad... flips through pages... just a jumble of crude shapes. JULIE (cont'd) You stole that?
I thought there might be something written in here.

And? Dane shakes his head... flips through the pages for Julie see... some totally blacked out, and others with just cru shapes drawn on the page. JULIE (cont'd) So we know how he spent his time in that room. Julie glances back to Lucas... he looks very scared. JULIE (cont'd) Hey, Lucas, how ‘bout we have a little pool party at my house? Order a pizza... swim... splash your brother.
Okay.
(to Dane) You up for it?
Sure.
I’ll meet you guys over there. Julie starts across the yard to her house.
(to Lucas) Go get your stuff. Lucas starts toward the back door... hesitates, just star at the house. DANE (cont’d) It’s cool. It’s nailed shut.  68. Lucas finally walks in.

Lucas steps inside... stops at the door, his eyes locked the basement door. He takes a couple steps across the roo then sprints past the door... races up the stairs. INT. PAYTON HOUSE/LUCAS’ ROOM - DAY Lucas charges inside... slams the door behind him, lockin it. He backs away from the door.
POV FROM UNDER LUCAS’ BED... ...-watching Lucas’ feet slowly back across the room.
And Lucas... satisfied that nothing’s coming through that door. He turns... starts digging through a dresser drawer

Dane still flipping through the notepad. INT. PAYTON HOUSE/LUCAS’ ROOM - DAY Lucas pulls a pair of shorts from the drawer. And then an O.S. JINGLE freezes him... ANOTHER JINGLE... Lucas is afr to turn around.
POV FROM UNDER LUCAS’ BED... .»..on Lucas just standing there.

As Lucas summons the courage to turn...  69. ...looks back across his room... no one’s there. Then his eyes sink to the bed... and what could be underneath. Luc just stares at that dark gap... .+.as the JINGLE RETURNS... louder... just beside Lucas. spins... sees the WIND CHIME HANGING IN HIS OPEN WINDOW.. ..--JINGLING WITH THE SUBTLE BREEZE. Lucas relaxes... carries the shorts toward the door.
POV FROM UNDER LUCAS’ BED... ++.as we watch Lucas walk out of the room.
Dane sits beside the pool, still studying that notepad. Julie’s in swimming, as Lucas bounces on the diving board
Hey, Dane, watch how big the splash is! Lucas leaps into the pool. Dane never sees the splash. Lucas rises back up to the surface. LUCAS (cont'd) Did you see that?
(without looking up) Sweet splash. Julie climbs out of the pool... flicks a little water on as she passes.
You’re lots of fun. Julie walks out to the end of the diving board. JULIE (cont'd) Watch this one, Lucas. Julie bounces off... hits the water, sending a big splash over Dane.  70.
(protecting the notepad) Hey!
Stop looking at that thing.

Yeah, come on! Dane shakes the water off the notepad... looks at Julie i the pool... just her face floating above the surface... looking like a mermaid as she spits some water in his direction. And that’s all he needs. Dane tosses the notepad away... runs to the board... leaps off, sending a splash over the pool.
.»+-as Dane sinks to the bottom... pushes off... rises ba the surface.
As Dane bobs up out of the water.

Beat that, losers. Julie leaps on Dane... they wrestle in the water, as Luca climbs out laughing... hurries to the board... bounces as high as he can, then... ...SPLASH... the water covers Dane and Julie. Julie SCREA

...as this time, Lucas sinks... his foot hits the bottom, just beside the drain... he pushes off... starts up. ANGLE ON LUCAS’ LEGS... ++.as a SMALL RED HAND SUDDENLY GRABS LUCAS’ ANKLE. Lucas’ rise jerks to a halt. He looks down...  71. ...and there’s the MARIONETTE CLOWN half out of the open drain... smiling up at Lucas as he grips his leg... gives a tug. Lucas CRIES OUT in the water... the pool floods into his mouth. He starts flailing his arms to get to the surface.
...-wrestling and playing at the other end of the pool... idea what’s happening below them.
.-..as he kicks at the clown... claws for the surface. But the Clown holds its grip... starts sinking back into drain, pulling Lucas toward the bottom of the pool.
.-.-Still playing... Dane shoving Julie underwater, then diving away... scrambling out of the pool.
...stretching for the surface, but sinking deeper... the Clown disappearing backward into the pool drain... pullin Lucas’ foot in with him.
.+-beside the pool, as Julie splashes him. Then he glance around.
Where'd Lucas go? Julie glances around... no idea.  72.
Did he get out?
Lucas! No answer... and then Dane sees the AIR BUBBLES RISING TO SURFACE. DANE (cont’d)
Dane dives into the pool.

.»+-as a panicked Lucas strains to pull his leg out of th drain. Dane swims in beside him... grabs Lucas... starts pulling up... BUT HIS FOOT WON’T COME OUT OF THE DRAIN. Dane dives deeper... starts tugging at Lucas’ foot... .+.-JjJust as Julie appears... wraps her arms around Luca waist to pull him up to the surface. Dane struggles against the drain’s pull... finally Lucas’ foot POPS FREE... ...all three shoot up to the surface.

head_text.subj: THE KIDS EXPLODING FROM THE SURFACE...

text: ...-Lucas COUGHING and GASPING FOR AIR. Dane and Julie ca him to the side.
It’s okay... it’s okay.
We’ve got you. They help him up over the edge, and Lucas scrambles out.
THE CLOWN’S IN THERE!  73.
What?
It’s in the pool! It grabbed my leg! Dane and Julie exchange a glance.
Dude, it was the drain. Your foot just got stuck.
Dane sinks back under.
.»+-as Dane scans the bottom of the pool... the open drai
...rises back up.
There’s just the drain. The lid came off.
No... it grabbed me... it pulled me down... wouldn’t let me go. Lucas starts crying... is ready to explode.
(to Julie) I’m gonna take him back over. Dane climbs out... starts leading Lucas back.
I’m sorry, Lucas. Lucas just keeps walking.  74. INT. PAYTON HOUSE/DANE’S ROOM - NIGHT Dane sits at his desk, watching Lucas sleep on the floor. His CELL PHONE BUZZES beside him. He grabs it.
How is he?
Been asleep since we got over here.
Anything I can do?
We're good. I’m just gonna let him sleep... hang out here with him.
Well call me if you need anything.

Okay. Talk to you later. Dane hangs up... slides over... eases the blanket across Lucas... ...then spots something... on Lucas’ leg... around his ankle... BRUISES... IN THE SHAPE OF SMALL FINGERS. Dane stares at the bruises... runs his finger along them, then freezes... hurries out of the room.

Dane runs down the stairs... to the couch... grabs Ethan’ notepad... starts quickly thumbing through the pages... s on one of the odd designs... and if you turn it to the ri angle, it LOOKS JUST LIKE LUCAS’ BRUISE... «..JUST LIKE FINGERS. Dane flips through more pages, turning the notepad in all directions... begins seeing other images in the shapes... EYE... HAND... what could be a nose. Dane starts tearing the pages out of the pad... laying th on the floor... like he’s laying out a giant puzzle. He starts moving the pages around... trying to connect the pieces.

Dane on his hands and knees at the center of all the page spread out all around him. Some of the pages fit together... we can make out what lo like a half-circle of black... a SHOE BESIDE THE CIRCLE.. TWO HANDS CLENCHED TOGETHER. And then an O.S. WHISTLING... a light MELODY... Dane look to the sound... it’s coming from the kitchen. Dane listens to it a moment, then stands... eases toward kitchen doorway... the WHISTLING GROWS LOUDER. Dane inches the door open...

Dane steps into the dark kitchen... flips on the light... WHISTLING IS GONE... .-+-and the kitchen is empty... ...except for a GREASE-STAINED MECHANIC’S SHIRT thrown ov one of the chairs. And Dane’s confused... frightened... like he’s just seen ghost, but it’s only a dirty shirt. Dane spins... charges out of the kitchen.

Dane sprints across the room... up the stairs. INT. PAYTON HOUSE/DANE’S ROOM - NIGHT Dane runs into the room... flips on the light... and ther Lucas still asleep on the floor. Dane throws a glance aro the room, then turns the light back off. He steps inside... closes the door, and climbs up into hi bed... but not to sleep... it’s like a guard keeping watc
Quiet and dark.  76.
Dim moonlight glows over Ethan’s scattered pages.
The trap door still swung open, exposing the hole.

.+.-as TWO DIRTY BARE FEET step into frame... move down t hall. INT. PAYTON HOUSE/DANE’S ROOM - NIGHT ANGLE ON LUCAS... ...-sleeping on the floor... as a SHADOW MOVES OVER HIM. Lucas must have sensed the presence because his eyes fly open... he starts to cry out, then sees it’s Dane standin above him, his finger to his lips.
(whispers) Someone’s in the house.
Dane and Lucas step into Dane’s doorway.
(whispers) Stay here. Dane has the baseball bat again... moving into Lucas’ roo INT. PAYTON HOUSE/LUCAS’ ROOM - CONTINUOUS Dane flips on the light... glances around... empty.
And Lucas staring anxiously toward his room. But then a BURST OF LIGHT FROM DOWNSTAIRS... someone just turned on lights.

(whispers) Dane. Dane. But Dane doesn’t hear him. So Lucas eases to the stairs.. peers over the rail to see who’s down there. But his view blocked, so he has to creep down a few steps... ..-and spots a YOUNG COP standing in the center of the li room, LOOKING RIGHT BACK UP AT LUCAS.
Hey, son. What’s your name? Lucas is afraid to answer... afraid to move. He throws another glance down the hall for Dane... not there, so he looks back to the cop.
Lucas.
Are you the one that called, Lucas?
(shakes his head) My brother, I think. He said someone was in the house.

Did your brother say who it was? Lucas shakes his head. The cop throws another glance arou the room, then pulls a Polaroid from his pocket... starts the stairs to Lucas. YOUNG COP (cont'd) I’ve been looking for this person right here. The young cop reaches Lucas... hands Lucas the photo. Luc looks at it, and fear washes over his face. ANGLE ON THE POLAROID... ...of TWO LITTLE GIRLS... one of them the LITTLE GIRL IN PINK DRESS.  78. YOUNG COP (cont'd) That one on the right. The cop turns to go back down the stairs, and that’s when Lucas sees the BLOODY, GAPING WOUND IN THE COP’S BACK... SHOULD BE DEAD... might be dead. YOUNG COP (cont'd) Do you think that’s who your brother saw? Lucas doesn’t answer... can’t answer... just watches the walk back down the stairs... around the corner. Dane appe behind Lucas.
I told you to stay in the room.
(whispers) He’s down there.
What?

He gave me this. Lucas holds the Polaroid out to Dane with a trembling han Dane stares at the picture, then moves down the stairs... leans around... sees the YOUNG COP WALK INTO THE BASEMENT Dane follows after him... and Lucas is too afraid to stay there by himself, so he rushes behind Dane... ...and never sees the DARK FIGURE OF A MAN STANDING DOWN HALL BEHIND HIM.

Dane and Lucas move slowly down the steps... bend down to peer through the railing... to watch the young cop crawl the hole, disappear head first, just like the little girl The trap door slams shut behind him.

You said the nails would keep it closed. You said they couldn’t come up anymore. Dane stares at all the loose nails scattered around the h Then he looks back to the photograph... the two little gi  79. ANGLE ON THE PHOTOGRAPH... .--and the other little girl... strangely familiar.
Oh, shit. He grabs Lucas’ arm. DANE (cont’d) C'mon. They race up the steps.

INT. JULIE’S HOUSE/JULIE’S ROOM - NIGHT Julie’s asleep in bed... stirs... rolls over... .--and there’s the LITTLE GIRL standing beside her... tho red tears slipping down her cheeks. Julie jumps back with a start... looks like she’s seen a ghost. She presses herself back against the wall.
I missed you, Julie. (beat) Let’s play. Just like we used to. Julie tries to scream... can’t make her mouth work.
(softly) Da... daddy.

Don’t let him hear you. He’1l make us go to bed. The Little Girl squats down on the floor... starts playin with the jacks. LITTLE GIRL (cont'd) Why didn’t you help me? Then an 0.S. TAPPING. Julie’s eyes dart to her window... Dane knocking against it... motioning her over. Julie looks back to the Little Girl... crawls down off th end of her bed... backs her way to the window, as the Lit Girl bounces the ball... scoops the jacks.  80. Julie reaches the window... shakily flips the lock... thr it open, as the Little Girl sees her escaping. LITTLE GIRL (cont'd) Don’t go, Julie. The Little Girl rises... starts walking after Julie. And Julie’s crying, as she scrambles out the window, with Dan pulling her. EXT. JULIE’S HOUSE - CONTINUOUS Julie hits the ground beside Dane and Lucas... they race away, as the Little Girl stands at the window, watching them... .»+.a red tear hitting the windowsill with a SPLAT.
Dane, Lucas and Julie charge through the back door... loc behind them. Julie falls against Dane, sobbing.
Who is she?
She can’t be real... she can’t be real.
Julie. Who is she? Julie tries to calm down... to focus.
Annie Binning. We used to play together every day when we were little. But then... Julie can’t finish.
Then?
She disappeared. Someone took her... a man. (beat) We were outside... and this man... he pulled up in a truck. (MORE)

JULIE (cont'd) He was dressed like a policeman, but I knew he wasn’t one... I'd seen him other days taking pictures of us. But this time he got out and started talking to Annie. Then he took Annie’s hand... (crying) ..-he took her hand and led her back to his truck. And I knew something bad was happening, and I wanted to yell, but I was so scared. I wanted to help her but I couldn't. Dane holds her tighter.
It’s okay. (beat) They found him, didn’t they? They found the man, and they shot him, right? Julie nods, then...
How'd you know?

(glances at Lucas) Just guessed. But I think I know why she’s here... why she came back. (off Julie’s look) Because you were so scared. Dane points to Ethan’s hole image on the floor. DANE (cont’d) I think inside the hole is whatever we're afraid of. That’s what Ethan meant by The Darkness... dark thoughts... fears. Remember, he said it knows you. I think he meant it knows what we’re scared of.
How?
I don’t know. But it makes our fears real... brings them to life. For Ethan it was snakes. (MORE )
DANE (cont'd) For Lucas it’s clowns. For you... it’s what happened to your friend.
What about you?
(smiles) I’m not scared of anything. But I still want to find some locks to put on that trap door. INT. JULIE’S GARAGE - NIGHT The kids dig through shelves and tool chests.
Got ‘em. Julie holds up a FEW PADLOCKS WITH THE KEYS STILL IN THEM
And we need one more thing.
Dane and Lucas stand against the wall. Julie kneels besid the hole, looking scared out of her mind.
I don’t want to do this.

It’s the only way. And then we see what Julie’s so scared about... the Littl Girl’s feet appear on the basement steps... make their wa slowly down. Julie’s trembling, as she watches the Little Girl reach t bottom... start walking toward her.
Oh, God. The Little Girl moves closer... closer... and Julie wants run, but she doesn’t... she just stares back at her fear.
Do you want to play with me?  83.
Some other time, okay, Annie? The Little Girl nods... reaches out her hand, and strokes Julie’s hair. Julie closes her eyes... quivers at the tou
You got bigger, Julie. And then Julie opens her eyes... tears well up in them.

I know. I’m sorry. Then Julie takes the Little Girl’s hand... holds it. Does seem scared anymore. Then the Little Girl turns, and crawls headfirst back int the hole... disappears. And as soon as she does, Dane and Lucas leap over... slam trap door closed.

The locks! Dane looks back to the locks still over on the floor. He darts back for them... ++.just as the TRAP DOOR BURSTS BACK OPEN, AND THE CLOWN MARIONETTE STRETCHES OUT... GRABS LUCAS’ ARM. LUCAS (cont'd)

The doll jerks Lucas toward the hole, but Julie grabs Lucas... holds him back, as the Marionette claws and tugs Lucas... its little bells JINGLING AWAY. Dane punches the doll away... it vanishes in the black, t WHAM... slams the trap door back down. The kids frantical snap the locks shut. There’s that 0O.S. CLAWING from unde the door, but it finally stops... everything calms... jus the kids’ heavy breathing, as they stare at that closed t door. Then... LUCAS (cont'd) (to Dane) Told you it was real. Dane nods... he believes.  84.
I know everything’s cool now and all, but... do you guys want to stay at my house tonight? Lucas nods wildly to Dane.
Yeah, okay.
Dane sits on the couch, staring blankly. Julie’s beside h
Are you okay? Dane snaps out of his zone... nods his head. JULIE (cont'd) It’s over, right? Nothing to worry about? Dane nods... right.
Lucas, let’s go!
I’m getting my stuff! Julie notices the notepad pages scattered on the floor.
Are those Ethan’s pages?
Yeah. I don’t know what it’s supposed to be. Julie walks over... takes a page... finds a place for it, then moves another... the dark edges seem to fit.

INT. PAYTON HOUSE/LUCAS’ ROOM - NIGHT Lucas sitting on the floor, putting his shoes on. And the TAPPING AT HIS WINDOW. Lucas looks over to the window... nothing there.  85. He goes back to his shoes... MORE TAPPING... his head sna up... still, the window’s empty.
Dane and Julie working together on the puzzle.
Right there. Dane slides a page in... Julie places another beside it.. the image is growing.

INT. PAYTON HOUSE/LUCAS’ ROOM - NIGHT Lucas stares at the window another beat, then starts craw over, keeping his head below the window... out of sight. reaches it, then slowly raises up to see outside. Nothing but his own reflection. And then Lucas notices something beyond his face... ...the REFLECTION OF A MONSTROUS MAN STANDING IN THE DOOR BEHIND HIM. Lucas spins... but there’s no man there. Lucas turns back the window... sees just his reflection again... NO MAN. So Lucas turns to walk out, and steps RIGHT INTO THE MAN. huge... long greasy hair... hard face... deep, dark eyes. More monster than man.
(whispers) Hello, boy. Lucas starts to scream, but the man throws a thick hand o his mouth, muffling Lucas’ cries.

A SMALL SQUARE OF CARPET with black on all sides... until Julie’s hand gently lays another page in the square... filling it in with black...  86. ...and we pull back... but don’t reach the edges of the image, because it’s much bigger than we last saw... cover most of the floor... with Dane and Julie standing over it ...staring down at those sketched designs now pieced together. It’s not completely finished, but it’s clear wh the image is... A PICTURE OF THE HOLE... WITH A MAN HOLDI BOY’S HAND... LEADING HIM DOWN INTO THE BLACKNESS.
Oh, God. Dane takes off... charges up the stairs. DANE (cont’d) Lucas! INT. PAYTON HOUSE/LUCAS’ ROOM - NIGHT Dane rushes into the room... no Lucas.
Lucas! Then he sees the GREASY FOOTPRINTS on the floor... leadin back out of the room. Dane steps out... sees that the footprints leave a trail the way down the hall. Julie appears up the stairs.
What’s the matter? Where’s Lucas? Dane takes off down the past Julie.
My father’s got him.
Dane comes barreling down the steps.
Lucas! And there’s that trap door OPEN WIDE... the new locks res on the floor beside it. Julie races down after Dane.
What’s going on?  87.
I brought him here. My father. And now he took Lucas down there.
What? No... there is no down there. There’s no bottom, remember?
But Dane isn’t listening to her... he’s grabbing a rope.. tying it around a pipe on the wall, then wrapping it arou his own waist. JULIE (cont'd) Dane, what are you doing?
I have to get Lucas.
Wait. You can’t go in that thing. You don’t even know he’s down there.
Yes I do. Then Dane steps into that shimmering darkness... WHOOSH.. vanishes into the black... the rope uncoils... stretches then SNAPS TAUT, bending the pipe.
Dane! But Dane’s long gone.

.-..end of the universe kind of dark. And it’s completely silent except for Dane’s nervous breaths. We hear some movement, then a LIGHT FLASHES ON... ..-and we see Dane’s standing inside a closet, his hand s on a light switch. The rope is still tied around his waist... stretches up to a BLACK HOLE HIGH ABOVE HIM. The closet’s filled with a little boy’s clothes and toys. Dane glances around, unties the rope, then his eyes settl the closet doorknob... he turns it... pushes the door ope  88. .--inching it wide to reveal a LONG, DARK, NARROW CORRIDO stretching out in front of him... no real light except fo DIM SQUARE at the far end of the hall.

Dane moves through the doorway... just a few steps. And i what little light there is, we can begin to make out the details of the corridor... -..Stone floor... rock walls... and lines of PRISON CELLS EACH SIDE for the length of the passage. Dane looks to th cells beside him... beyond the rusty bars... empty... jus cot in a square room of stone. Dane begins walking down the corridor... toward the light the far end. And the passage seems to stretch forever... like the end is a football field away. Dane throws nervous glances into each cell as he passes.. picking up speed toward the far end... nearing it, and slowing... ..-because he can make out where the light is coming from ANOTHER PRISON CELL... this one glowing with a small lamp and there’s a Man sitting slumped over on the cot... his long, greasy hair hangs down almost to the floor. And we all know who the Man is... so does Dane... that’s he stops outside the cell door... just stares at him... watches as the Man slowly raises his head... rolls those black eyes up toward Dane... and smiles. Dane takes an instinctive step back... but then sees the SHACKLES around the Man’s hands and feet. That gives him courage to...

(soft, frightened) Where’s Lucas? Suddenly the CLANK of a cell door unlocking behind Dane. Dane spins... sees one of the cell doors swinging open. Dane looks at the smiling Man, then begins backing down t hall... nearing the open cell while keeping his eyes on t Man. Finally Dane reaches the open door... looks inside... .--but it isn’t a prison cell anymore... it’s Lucas’ room their house...  89. .+..and LUCAS IS CLIMBING OUT THE WINDOW. DANE (cont’d) Lucas! Lucas doesn’t slow. Dane charges into the room after him. reaches the window and looks out... to their yard below.. .--and Lucas racing across the yard. DANE (cont’d)
Dane crawls out after him.
Dane scrambles out... starts to jump, then sees that ther NO GROUND BENEATH HIM... just endless darkness. Dane clings to the edge of the window.
But Lucas is gone... or was never there. Dane climbs back inside.
Dane falls back through the window... sees that Lucas’ ro is now just an empty prison cell... same rock floor... st walls.

Dane steps out of the cell... looks back down to where th Man was sitting... ..-but now the COT IS EMPTY... the shackles rest free on floor... the Man is gone. The cell door CLANKS... CREAKS as it drifts open. And the the next cell door swings open... then the one across the hall from that... then the next... and the next... .»+-each door violently crashing open... moving down the toward Dane... and each one faster than the one before... he’s coming for Dane.  90. Dane spins... takes off down the corridor... the cell doo flying open behind him... gaining on him... and it’s a ra to that WHITE CLOSET DOOR at the end of the passage. And it’s like the doors are being blown off their rusty hinges, as they tear wide... crash into the walls... almo even with Dane as he... ...reaches the closet door... charges through.

Dane slams the door shut... presses himself against it... ready for the attack from the other side... but it never comes. He spots an OLD KEY hanging on the wall beside the door... he grabs it... LOCKS THE DOOR. Dane steps away from the door... turns... sees he’s ina large, vacant room... four walls and a floor... and anoth door on the opposite wall. He hurries to the door... locked. He’s still got the key. slides it into the handle... turns... ...AND THE UNLOCKING CLICK COMES FROM BEHIND DANE. Dane looks back... the other door’s still closed. He turn his door handle... a SQUEAK from the other door. Dane glances back again... stares at the door as he turns knob... .+-and watches the other handle rotate by itself. Dane inches his door open... ...the other door widens as well. Then BAM... something hits Dane’s door from the other sid He shoves it back closed... presses his back against it.. .--and watches as the opposite door shakes back and forth exactly as his. And Dane’s losing his battle... his door’s widening... so the other... .--and finally Dane just takes off... lets his door swing open... .--and when the opposite door opens wide, he sprints thro  gl.

Dane suddenly slams to the floor with a GASP. He looks ab him... there is no ceiling... just darkness... with a DAR BLACK HOLE shimmering in the middle of it. Dane stands... eases across the room. RAIN and TRAFFIC NO beat against the windows... it feels just like we’re in Queens. A PAIR OF GREASY BOOTS rests beside the back door... a MECHANIC’S SHIRT lays over the chair. FAMILY PHOTOGRAPHS hang on the refrigerator door. We hold one of A YOUNG BOY AND BABY BROTHER, (Dane and Lucas). This is Dane’s old house... where all of Dane’s fears beg Suddenly the end of the rope falls through the black hole drops down beside Dane... just hangs there... ..-with a NOTE tied around the end... “RUN AWAY BOY” Dane looks to the doorway... knows what waits for him on other side. He looks back up to the hole... his escape. B then he tears the note off... crumples it, and tosses it away... walks toward the doorway.

Dane steps through the doorway... into the empty room... a tray of half-eaten food and beer cans sitting in front the television, as a YANKEES GAME plays onscreen. Dane creeps through the room, his eyes searching for Luca

A room for two boys. A twin bed on one side and crib on t other... each with matching baseball blankets... one Nati League, the other American. Sports posters line the walls another photograph of the YOUNG DANE in his baseball unif with BABY LUCAS sitting in his lap. Dane moves straight for the closet... opens the door, and closet is filled with clothes, toys and junk of a little boy... this is just like the closet where Dane arrived wh he jumped into the hole. And then Lucas steps out from behind the clothes.  92. They see each other... wrap their arms around the other. Dane holds Lucas tight... probably like he hasn’t hugged in years. Dane closes the door behind him, sealing the two boys ins together.
Dane and Lucas slide down to the floor together.
How'd you know where I was?
Because this is where I always used to hide when I was scared.
You did? (off Dane’s nod) I thought you said you weren't scared of anything. A beat, then...
I lied.
You’re scared of him?
(nods ) And it’s my fault he brought you here. He’s my fear, not yours.
Then you shouldn’t have come down.
I had to. What would I do up there without you?
What you always do. Play with the older kids.
Listen to me... I know it seems like I’m always gettin’ mad at you, or hangin’ out with other people, but... (MORE )

DANE (cont'd) that’s the thing with brothers... (beat, thinking) ...they’re like old closets. ‘Cause no matter how many new friends you make or new places you go... there’s only one place where you really feel good and safe. (beat) And sometimes you just gotta get scared enough to remember that. Lucas considers all this a moment, then...
But you still shouldn’t have come.
Why?
Because that’s what he wanted. He said he only took me so he could get you down here. Suddenly a HAND REACHES OUT FROM THE CLOTHES BEHIND LUCAS .--jerks him backward.

Dane grabs for Lucas... misses... Lucas is gone. Dane pushes through the clothes after him. And the closet seems to go on forever... LUCAS’ CRIES leading Dane throu this endless dark passage... .+-until Dane finally SLAMS INTO THE BACK WALL... and the is no Lucas. DANE (cont’d) (pounding the wall)
Dane spins... races back toward the closet door... reache it... throws it open.
The closet door swings open, and Dane charges out... free because this isn’t where he should be.  94.
Don’t tell him where we are. Dane turns to the voice... the SHOWER CURTAIN PULLED ACRO THE OLD TUB.
Lucas. Dane pulls the shower curtain open... .+-and there’s the YOUNG DANE, crouched in the tub, holdi the BABY LUCAS in his arms.
Please. Dane just stares at his younger self.
You don’t have to be scared of him. He can’t hurt you anymore. THEN A BANGING ON THE DOOR BEHIND DANE... .--he spins to it. FATHER’S VOICE (0.S.)

head_text.subj: I TOLD YOU TO OPEN THIS DOOR, BOY

text: Leave them alone!
Mom! Dane throws open the door... rushes into the darkness...
.»+-and Dane comes tumbling out of the black hole in the kitchen... SLAMS TO THE FLOOR... .--he’s right back where he started.
No! Dane scrambles toward the living room door.  95. DANE (cont’d) Lucas!

Dane charges through the door... into the living room... slides to a stop... because there’s the Man... DANE’S FATHER... sitting on the couch... his arm DRAPED OVER LUC SHOULDERS. Tears slip down Lucas’ cheeks.

Let him go. Dane’s Father just holds Lucas tighter. DANE (cont’d) You aren’t real. Their Father rises to his bare feet... and not only does look very real, he’s huge... must be close to seven feet tall. He rests a hand on Lucas’ head, and it’s nearly twi the size of Lucas’ skull. And there’s a GIANT GOLD RING o one of his MASSIVE FINGERS. And Lucas is scared... and so is Dane... and so are we. DANE (cont’d) You aren’t really here. You're still locked up. You can’t get to us. The Father gives Dane a frightening little smile... like knows something Dane doesn’t. DANE (cont’d) C’mon, Lucas. He can’t hurt us anymore. Lucas is afraid to move. DANE (cont’d) Now, Lucas. Lucas starts easing out from under the massive hand. And we're expecting it to suddenly clamp down... grab a fistf of hair... but it doesn’t... it lets Lucas go. Lucas takes off to Dane... wraps his arms around his wais DANE (cont’d) It’s okay. We’re going home now.  96. Dane takes Lucas’ hand... they back their way toward the kitchen door, with their Father just watching them escape DANE (cont’d) And don’t try to come after me again. You’re just wasting your time. Dane reaches the door... pushes against it... but it does move. He looks back... sees the SIX DEADBOLT LOCKS SECURI IT SHUT. Their Father grins that evil grin of his... holds up a SE KEYS.
They can keep things out... or keep things in. Dane shoves Lucas toward the hall.
Go! Lucas takes off with Dane right behind him. Their Father just LAUGHS at them as they run past.
An old washer and dryer with a row of cabinets beside the Dane and Lucas duck into the room... lock the door.
He’s gonna get us.

No he’s not. Dane throws open one of the cabinets... pulls Lucas down toward it. DANE (cont’d) He didn’t know about this one. Dane pushes Lucas inside the cabinet... follows after him their FATHER BEATS HIS FISTS AGAINST THE DOOR.
Tight, dark and claustrophobic... Lucas and Dane squeezin their way down the tiny passage.  97.
I can’t make it.
Yes you can. Keep going.
It’s too small.
Don’t stop, Lucas.
And the door flying open... their father fills the doorwa can barely squeeze through. He crouches down... sees the opening through the back of the cabinet.
And he’s way too big, so he spins... charges back out of room.
One of the kitchen cabinets swings open, and out crawls Lucas, with Dane right behind.

Get to the rope! Then the BANGING of their Father working the locks on the other side of the door. DANE (cont’d) Hurry, Lucas! Dane lifts Lucas... gives him a head start up that rope. DANE (cont’d) Get to the hole! Dane throws a frightened glance to the door as it SHAKES. those locks are coming off. Dane pulls the kitchen table over against the door, then runs back to Lucas... starts shoving him up. DANE (cont’d) You gotta go faster!  98.

I’m trying! Dane plants his hand on Lucas’ butt, shoving him up the rope... starts up beneath him... .+.jJust as the DOOR STARTS SWINGING IN AGAINST THE TABLE Lucas strains with each pull... slowly rising. Their Father leans his head through the crack of the door sees them making their escape. He BANGS HIS SHOULDER AGAI THE DOOR... shoving the table out of the way... .--he’s getting in.

I need you to go faster, Lucas. Please go faster. Lucas is trying... sweating each tug on the rope... squir upward toward that hole. And Dane’s just beneath him, as their Father scrambles ov the table... gets to the rope, and starts swinging it... trying to shake the boys down. But the boys keep climbing, so he starts up after them... taking big long pulls... gaining fast... ...the boys are never going to make it... .»+.-SO Dane RELEASES THE ROPE... drops straight down int their Father... sending them both crashing to the kitchen floor.
Dane! Their Father jumps up... starts up the rope after Lucas.
Go! I’1l be right behind you! Lucas can’t make himself rise into the hole just above hi head. Their Father continues up after him... until Dane grabs his leg... holds him back. DANE (cont’d)

Lucas climbs higher... his head disappears into the hole. then his body... finally he’s gone.  99. And Dane’s Father releases the rope... drops down to the floor with a THUNDEROUS BANG... like a giant has just dro from the sky. Dane backs up against the refrigerator. His Father walks toward him, and Dane closes his eyes... turns away from h Father... just the way he used to when he was little. The Father eases up behind Dane... towers over him. And then... DANE (cont’d) (softly) I’m not scared of you. (beat) I’m not scared of you. The Father cocks his oversized head. Dane pulls something down from the refrigerator... stares at it, then turns to face his Father... forces himself to stare up into those black eyes. DANE (cont’d) I’m not scared of you. And then Dane’s Father ROARS... this cry that shakes the room... the cry of Dane’s childhood.
Dane flinches at the scream... wants to run... would have before... but not this time. Instead, he just looks down the PHOTOGRAPH from the refrigerator.

You aren’t this big. You only looked like it because I was little. ANGLE ON THE PHOTOGRAPH... ++. a YOUNG DANE posing with HIS REAL FATHER... a VERY AVERAGE-LOOKING MAN. DANE (V.O.) (cont'd) That’s why you always came after us. Because you were mean... but you were scared of everyone else. Dane looks up from the picture... .--and the giant monster of a man is gone... replaced by FATHER FROM THE PHOTOGRAPH... average... slight...  100. smaller than Dane even... nothing like the monster Dane’s fears had created... except for those same mean eyes... ..-but now they’re filled with fear... like he’s the one this room that’s suddenly scared. And Dane smiles... and at the same time, tears fill his eyes... because he’s suddenly been set free. DANE (cont’d) You were the one that was weak and afraid. And now I know that. Dane turns his back on his Father... walks to the rope. DANE (cont’d) I would tell you to stay away from Lucas, but there’s no reason. Dane looks back... the kitchen’s empty... his Father's gone... his fear is gone. DANE (cont’d) You don’t exist. Then Dane starts climbing up the rope.
Lucas and Julie kneel beside the hole... see Dane rising the black.
Dane! They help him crawl out. Julie slams the trap door shut, attaches one of the locks, while Lucas works the other... seals the trap door shut. As soon as Lucas is finished, he hugs Dane... hard.
Nice climbin’, Lucas.
You okay?
Better. Julie stares at him, waiting for more... doesn’t get it, SO...  101.
I need more than that. What was down there?
My father. Clowns. Dane looks at Lucas... what?
Didn’t you see them? It was like this giant, scary circus. There were clowns everywhere.
What are you talking about?
All the clowns that kept chasing me.
Was that before we crawled into the kitchen? Now Lucas is looking at Dane like he’s crazy.
What kitchen?
Where the rope was... we were climbing up... I told you to go on. Lucas just stares at Dane a confused beat, then...
I didn’t see you down there. Dane looks back to the trap door.
Dane, Lucas and Julie stand in the front yard, staring ba at the house.
Whatta we do now?
Come over to my place. We’ll figure it.  102. Dane nods... just as HEADLIGHTS WASH OVER THEM... they tu to Susan’s SUV pulling back into the driveway. She parks. climbs out.
What are you three doing out here so late?
We were just... having trouble sleeping.
Maybe that’s because you’re standing in the driveway.
I thought you were going to be gone for a couple days?
Had to change my plans a little.
Why?
You're going to think I’m crazy. But I had this dream... and it seemed so real... that I lost both of you. (hugs them both) And that’s my worst fear.
I don’t think you have to worry about that anymore.
What does that mean? The kids exchange a glance.
We should probably talk.
A For Sale sign stands in the yard. Susan’s SUV is parked the drive.  103.
Susan walks around the house with a REALTOR.

It’s only six years old. The nicest kitchen in town, and plenty of storage space for those growing boys. They stop at the window... look out into the backyard... Dane and Lucas playing basketball. Julie sits in the gras watching them. REALTOR (cont’d) Do you think they’d like to come inside and take a look for themselves?
Let’s leave them out there.
Well they sure do look like they enjoy each other.

Yes they do. Susan and the realtor walk out of the frame, as we stay o the window... and Dane and Lucas laughing... playing... b brothers again. SUSAN (0.S.) (cont'd) Now you said this place doesn’t have a basement, right? FADE OUT.
